languages.text: {n}Усталость и напряжение, читавшиеся в позе Ханна, наконец берут верх. Он роняет голову и снова устало трет лоб.{/n} "Я смотрю в глаза варпа сколько себя помню, но никогда еще не был к нему так близко. Все силы уходят на то, чтобы сдержать его. Но сколько я еще продержусь? Я не хочу сойти с ума и уподобиться остальным".

traits.locale_text: {n}Усталость и напряжение, читавшиеся в позе Ханна, наконец берут верх. Он роняет голову и снова устало трет лоб.{/n} "Я смотрю в глаза варпа сколько себя помню, но никогда еще не был к нему так близко. Все силы уходят на то, чтобы сдержать его. Но сколько я еще продержусь? Я не хочу сойти с ума и стать как они..."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}The exhaustion and tension in Hann's posture finally get the better of him. His head drops, and he rubs his forehead once more.{/n} "I've been gazing into the eyes of the warp for as long as I can remember, yet I've never been so close to it. It's taken all my strength to keep it at bay. But for how much longer can I hold on? I don't want to go mad and become like the others."
languages.original_text: {n}Усталость и напряжение, читавшиеся в позе Ханна, наконец берут верх. Он роняет голову и снова устало трет лоб.{/n} "Я смотрю в глаза варпа сколько себя помню, но никогда еще не был к нему так близко. Все силы уходят на то, чтобы сдержать его. Но сколько я еще продержусь? Я не хочу сойти с ума и уподобиться остальным".

It's taken all my strength to keep it at bay. But for how much longer can I hold on? I don't want to go mad and become like the others."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}ハンの姿勢から伺えた疲労と緊張がより一層強くなった。彼はうなだれ、もう一度額をこすった。{/n}「私は物心ついたときから〈歪み〉の目を見つめてきましたが、これほど近づいたのは初めてです。あらゆる力をふり絞り抑えるようにしていますが…それもいつまで持つでしょう？他の者たちのように正気を失いたくありません」
languages.original_text: {n}The exhaustion and tension in Hann's posture finally get the better of him. His head drops, and he rubs his forehead once more.{/n} "I've been gazing into the eyes of the warp for as long as I can remember, yet I've never been so close to it. It's taken all my strength to keep it at bay. But for how much longer can I hold on? I don't want to go mad and become like the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンの姿勢から伺えた疲労と緊張がより一層強くなった。彼はうなだれ、もう一度額をこすった。{/n}「私は物心ついたときから〈歪み〉の目を見つめてきましたが、これほど近づいたのは初めてです。あらゆる力をふり絞り抑えるようにしていますが…それもいつまで持つでしょう？他の者たちのように正気を失いたくありません」
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}汉恩一直努力隐藏的疲惫与紧张，此刻终于流露出来。他低下头，再次揉了揉额头。{/n}“从我记事起，我就一直凝视着亚空间之眼，但我从未如此接近过它。我用尽所有的力量来抵抗它，可我究竟还能坚持多久？我不想像其他人那样变成疯子。”
languages.original_text: {n}The exhaustion and tension in Hann's posture finally get the better of him. His head drops, and he rubs his forehead once more.{/n} "I've been gazing into the eyes of the warp for as long as I can remember, yet I've never been so close to it. It's taken all my strength to keep it at bay. But for how much longer can I hold on? I don't want to go mad and become like the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}汉恩一直努力隐藏的疲惫与紧张，此刻终于流露出来。他低下头，再次揉了揉额头。{/n}“从我记事起，我就一直凝视着亚空间之眼，但我从未如此接近过它。我用尽所有的力量来抵抗它，可我究竟还能坚持多久？我不想像其他人那样变成疯子。”
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}El cansancio y la tensión de la postura de Hann por fin le pasan factura. Agacha la cabeza y vuelve a frotarse la frente.{/n} «Llevo escudriñando la disformidad desde que tengo uso de razón, pero nunca he estado tan cerca de ella. He necesitado todas mis fuerzas para mantenerla a raya y no sé cuánto tiempo podré seguir aguantando. No quiero enloquecer y acabar como los demás».
languages.original_text: {n}The exhaustion and tension in Hann's posture finally get the better of him. His head drops, and he rubs his forehead once more.{/n} "I've been gazing into the eyes of the warp for as long as I can remember, yet I've never been so close to it. It's taken all my strength to keep it at bay. But for how much longer can I hold on? I don't want to go mad and become like the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}El cansancio y la tensión de la postura de Hann por fin le pasan factura. Agacha la cabeza y vuelve a frotarse la frente.{/n} «Llevo escudriñando la disformidad desde que tengo uso de razón, pero nunca he estado tan cerca de ella. He necesitado todas mis fuerzas para mantenerla a raya y no sé cuánto tiempo podré seguir aguantando. No quiero enloquecer y acabar como los demás».
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}L'épuisement et la tension dans la posture de Hann finissent par l'emporter. Il laisse retomber sa tête et se frotte à nouveau le front.{/n} « J'ai le regard plongé dans le Warp depuis plus longtemps que je ne saurais le dire, et pourtant, je n'en ai jamais été aussi proche. Il me faut employer toutes mes forces pour le garder à distance, mais combien de temps vais-je encore pouvoir tenir ? Je ne veux pas devenir fou et me transformer, comme les autres. »
languages.original_text: {n}The exhaustion and tension in Hann's posture finally get the better of him. His head drops, and he rubs his forehead once more.{/n} "I've been gazing into the eyes of the warp for as long as I can remember, yet I've never been so close to it. It's taken all my strength to keep it at bay. But for how much longer can I hold on? I don't want to go mad and become like the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'épuisement et la tension dans la posture de Hann finissent par l'emporter. Il laisse retomber sa tête et se frotte à nouveau le front.{/n} « J'ai le regard plongé dans le Warp depuis plus longtemps que je ne saurais le dire, et pourtant, je n'en ai jamais été aussi proche. Il me faut employer toutes mes forces pour le garder à distance, mais combien de temps vais-je encore pouvoir tenir ? Je ne veux pas devenir fou et me transformer, comme les autres. »
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Die Erschöpfung und Anspannung übermannen Hann endlich doch. Sein Kopf sinkt herab, und er massiert erneut seine Stirn.{/n} "Ich habe, länger als meine Erinnerung zurückreicht, ins Auge des Warp geblickt und war ihm doch noch nie so nah. Ich habe all meine Kraft gebraucht, um ihn auf Distanz zu halten. Aber wie lange halte ich das noch durch? Ich will nicht wahnsinnig werden und enden wie die anderen."
languages.original_text: {n}The exhaustion and tension in Hann's posture finally get the better of him. His head drops, and he rubs his forehead once more.{/n} "I've been gazing into the eyes of the warp for as long as I can remember, yet I've never been so close to it. It's taken all my strength to keep it at bay. But for how much longer can I hold on? I don't want to go mad and become like the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Erschöpfung und Anspannung übermannen Hann endlich doch. Sein Kopf sinkt herab, und er massiert erneut seine Stirn.{/n} "Ich habe, länger als meine Erinnerung zurückreicht, ins Auge des Warp geblickt und war ihm doch noch nie so nah. Ich habe all meine Kraft gebraucht, um ihn auf Distanz zu halten. Aber wie lange halte ich das noch durch? Ich will nicht wahnsinnig werden und enden wie die anderen."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Hann'ın bitkinliği ve duruşundaki gerginlik nihayet etkisini gösteriyor. Başı eğiliyor ve bir kez daha alnını ovmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Kendimi bildim bileli öteboyutun gözlerinin içine bakmışımdır. Ancak ona hiçbir zaman bu kadar yakın olmamıştım. Ona teslim olmamak için tüm gücümü kullanmak zorunda kaldım, peki daha ne kadar dayanabileceğim? Aklımı yitirip diğerleri gibi olmak istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The exhaustion and tension in Hann's posture finally get the better of him. His head drops, and he rubs his forehead once more.{/n} "I've been gazing into the eyes of the warp for as long as I can remember, yet I've never been so close to it. It's taken all my strength to keep it at bay. But for how much longer can I hold on? I don't want to go mad and become like the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann'ın bitkinliği ve duruşundaki gerginliği nihayet ona etki etmeye başlıyor. Başı eğiliyor ve bir kez daha alnını ovmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Kendimi bildim bileli öteboyutun gözlerinin içine bakmışımdır ancak ona hiçbir zaman bu kadar yakın olmadım. Ona teslim olmamak için tüm gücümü kullanmak zorunda kaldım ama daha ne kadar dayanabileceğim? Aklımı yitirip diğerleri gibi olmak istemiyorum."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator
